thread.title: Already someone in my room
thread.title_full: Already someone in my room - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: hastwj
title: Already someone in my room
text:
Upon arrival at my room, I opened the door to find someone else already lying on the bed. I was then made to wait and sent 30min across town to another place to stay, far from where I needed to be in the morning.
I complained twice online but a month later I'm still yet to hear back.
Unprofessional.
